Metadata.Title: Content Directories Have Deny Write ACE for Anonymous Internet Accounts
Metadata.DirectLink: Content Directories Have Deny Write ACE for Anonymous Internet Accounts
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
What to Check For

Check to ensure that write access to Web content directories is denied for anonymous internet accounts.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
